title: Chronological or Discussion view
body: curious as to how you guys use boards.

replies.body: I'm chronological. When I'm following a thread I like to read what people have to say, so I find chrono is better at doing that, unless the thread has 100+ comments, then it just get's hard either way. Personally I'd love to see a button that takes you to "new" comments in a thread.

~~discussion~~  chrono alll the wayyy

It would feel like leddit if i used discussion

> [{quoted}](name=Garens Harem,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wEQjymed,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-25T07:32:50.617+0000)
>
> discussion alll the wayyy
> 
> It would feel like leddit if i used chrono

it's more like old forums in chronological though.
